title: USWNT media day : Naming new captain , Megan Rapinoe injury update and investing in women

Morgan is familiar with the role of captain, given her experience and stature on the team. The USWNTâ€™s 2019 World Cup success was won with the backdrop of an equal pay lawsuit, accusing the United States Soccer Federation of â€œinstitutionalized gender discriminationâ€ toward the team. The upcoming World Cup will be the first Morgan will play as a mother, after giving birth to her daughter Charlie in 2020.
